articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: Possible there will be no rate cuts this year, European Central Bank member says - CNBC
articles.description: Market participants expecting a rate cut in April will be "deeply disappointed," Austria's Robert Holzmann said.
articles.content:
The European Central Bank may defy market expectations and hold off on starting interest rate cuts during the whole of 2024, the institution's Governing Council member Robert Holzmann said Monday.
